      • addControlVar

        public void addControlVar​(java.lang.String name)
        Description copied from interface: IMonitor
        Creates a new spot in the log to monitor a variable.

        The variables will be written to the log in the same order as they were added.

        Use ONLY for control module!

        Specified by:
        addControlVar in interface IMonitor
        Parameters:
        name - Add the name to identify the monitored variable.

      • writeControlVar

        public void writeControlVar​(java.lang.String name,
                            java.lang.String var)
        Description copied from interface: IMonitor
        Writes value of the specified variable to log.

        Add the name of the variable using "addControlVar" BEFORE using this method

        Method should only be called once per variable. The order in which variables are written does not matter.

        Use ONLY for control module!

        Specified by:
        writeControlVar in interface IMonitor
        Parameters:
        name - Add the name to identify the monitored variable.
        var - Value of the variable to be monitored (cast to string).
